BackstoryDef.title: policeman
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] kept the peace as a line officer in a municipal social enforcement unit. \n[PAWN_pronoun] was trained in de-escalation, physical control, shooting, and other police skills.

BackstoryDef.title: chef
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the star chef at a high-class coreworld restaurant. [PAWN_pronoun] was famous among patrons for [PAWN_possessive] creative culinary specialties, and infamous among the kitchen staff for [PAWN_possessive] casual disdain for grunt work.

BackstoryDef.title: housemate
BackstoryDef.description: As an adult, [PAWN_nameDef] kept house and cared for [PAWN_possessive] children while [PAWN_possessive] spouse worked.

BackstoryDef.title: inventor
BackstoryDef.description: On [PAWN_possessive] homeworld, [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a moderately successful inventor. [PAWN_pronoun] developed several minor technologies.

BackstoryDef.title: teacher
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was educated in the liberal arts and taught at a public school. [PAWN_pronoun] was widely knowledgeable and well-liked by [PAWN_possessive] students.

BackstoryDef.title: civil servant
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a low-ranking administrator for a moribund government bureaucracy. [PAWN_pronoun] is most at home filling out complicated paperwork and playing office politics.

BackstoryDef.title: bartender
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a bartender in a seedy establishment. The job was one part drink-mixing, one part diplomacy, and one part head-bashing.

BackstoryDef.title: conceptual artist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was well-known in art circles on [PAWN_possessive] home world for [PAWN_possessive] unique and creative conceptual artworks.\n\nNobody was sure exactly what [PAWN_pronoun] was trying to communicate, but [PAWN_possessive] pieces were highly valued by collectors.

BackstoryDef.title: evangelist
BackstoryDef.description: As a youth, [PAWN_nameDef] experienced a religious awakening. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to spend the rest of [PAWN_possessive] life spreading the word of [PAWN_possessive] deity, the beauty of its culture, and its unusual medical tradition.

BackstoryDef.title: ascetic priest
BackstoryDef.description: After taking a vow of silence, [PAWN_nameDef] joined a monastery to spend [PAWN_possessive] days in quiet contemplation.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] found happiness growing vegetables in the garden and making cheese in the monastery cellars.

BackstoryDef.title: escaped convict
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] denies involvement in the crimes that brought about [PAWN_possessive] incarceration in a brutal penal colony. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped by tunneling beneath the perimeter using modified cutlery.

BackstoryDef.title: nurse
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a hospital, doing routine work such as changing bandages and taking temperatures.\n\nIt was a busy job, but [PAWN_pronoun] could always find time for a chat with a patient.

BackstoryDef.title: house servant
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a domestic servant to wealthy homeowners.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] got to know the kitchens and basements of [PAWN_possessive] master's mansion well, but never did any work outside.

BackstoryDef.title: bodyguard
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] protected whoever paid [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] gained proficiency in many different combat forms, and was known for [PAWN_possessive] ruthlessness against those who crossed [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: mathematician
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] did mathematical research at a university.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] spent much of [PAWN_possessive] spare time immersed in shooting simulations, though [PAWN_pronoun] was frequently ridiculed by other players for [PAWN_possessive] terrible aim.

BackstoryDef.title: paramedic
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s job was to respond rapidly to medical emergencies. [PAWN_pronoun] is used to dealing with severe injuries with only limited medical supplies.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] treated so many gunshot wounds over the years that even seeing a gun made [PAWN_objective] uncomfortable.

BackstoryDef.title: gardener
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked at the mansion of a powerful family, tending the lavish gardens as part of a team of servants.

BackstoryDef.title: torturer
BackstoryDef.description: Working for a tyrannical dictator, [PAWN_nameDef] earned a reputation as an expert in 'persuasion.' Any prisoner who went down into the dungeons left with no secrets - and with [PAWN_nameDef]'s smile scarred permanently into their nightmares.

BackstoryDef.title: defector
BackstoryDef.description: Early in [PAWN_possessive] adulthood, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to leave the oppressive dictatorship where [PAWN_pronoun] lived. [PAWN_possessive] defection was not well-received, and agents were sent out after [PAWN_objective].\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] spent years on the run, treating [PAWN_possessive] own wounds so no doctor could betray [PAWN_objective]. The ordeal made [PAWN_objective] bitter and untrusting.

BackstoryDef.title: construction engineer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a construction worker. [PAWN_pronoun] lead a team which built everything from office blocks to cathedrals.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] busy job and numerous nearby fast-food outlets meant [PAWN_pronoun] never cooked for [PAWN_objective]self.

BackstoryDef.title: rancher
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] owned and operated a successful ranch where [PAWN_pronoun] raised animals for meat and wool.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] refused to do any dumb labour [PAWN_pronoun] could pay someone else to do for [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: low-wage worker
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked a variety of casual jobs to support [PAWN_possessive] family, gaining a set of basic hands-on skills.

BackstoryDef.title: model
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] modelled clothes and jewellery for advertisers, and was also used as a physical blueprint for characters in virtual reality simulations.

BackstoryDef.title: geologist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked with miners and cave-diggers, identifying rock types and natural formations.\n\nDuring [PAWN_possessive] years underground [PAWN_pronoun] also gained experience repairing drilling machines and other technical equipment.

BackstoryDef.title: jailbird
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] life in prisons, where [PAWN_pronoun] was put to work in the kitchens. [PAWN_pronoun] had a habit of getting into fights, and developed an aggressive way of speaking.

BackstoryDef.title: actor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled with a company of actors, playing to packed theatres and loving audiences everywhere. [PAWN_pronoun] was a perfectionist, and made [PAWN_possessive] own props and costumes rather than use the ones [PAWN_pronoun] was given.

BackstoryDef.title: veterinarian
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] treated sick and injured animals for a living. Seeing their suffering affected [PAWN_possessive] stance on the practice of eating meat, and for many years [PAWN_pronoun] lived as a vegetarian.

BackstoryDef.title: explosives expert
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an explosive engineer employed in mines. [PAWN_pronoun] took [PAWN_possessive] job very seriously and was well-versed in the technicalities - so much so that [PAWN_pronoun] refused to demean [PAWN_objective]self by helping with the clean-up once [PAWN_possessive] carefully-calculated explosion was complete.

BackstoryDef.title: counselor
BackstoryDef.description: A terrifying trauma when [PAWN_nameDef] was a young adult caused [PAWN_objective] to develop a serious eating disorder. With counseling [PAWN_pronoun] learned to have a healthier relationship with food, and decided to put [PAWN_possessive] new skills to use helping others overcome their emotional problems.

BackstoryDef.title: recruiter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a revered order of martial artists, infamous both for their skill in combat and for their practice of refusing to treat their wounded.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] traveled [PAWN_possessive] homeworld, judging the young people [PAWN_pronoun] met to determine if they might be suitable for training.

BackstoryDef.title: drifter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] never figured out what to do with [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] traveled often, taking up casual work wherever [PAWN_pronoun] found it.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] also occasionally worked on a novel that [PAWN_pronoun] knew would be a bestseller - just as soon as [PAWN_pronoun] could find a publisher who was interested.

BackstoryDef.title: machine collector
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was obsessed with old machines and arcane pieces of technology. [PAWN_pronoun] obtained them wherever [PAWN_pronoun] could, and loved taking them apart to see how they worked.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] had a habit of talking about [PAWN_possessive] collection long after people around [PAWN_objective] had stopped listening.

BackstoryDef.title: con artist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] never created anything in [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] did, however, prove to be a natural at getting others to give [PAWN_objective] what they had created.

BackstoryDef.title: cave explorer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] made a living mapping out dark tunnels and near-inaccessible crevices in search of valuable minerals. [PAWN_possessive] work was very dangerous, but the pay was good.

BackstoryDef.title: quarry worker
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a quarry helping to extract valuable stone from the hillside. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to sense opportunities and dangers in the stone by sight, touch, and intuition.

BackstoryDef.title: contract miner
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] moved from job to job, extracting minerals and ancient valuables in tunnels and strip-mines. The work was tough and dirty, but [PAWN_pronoun] found it rewarding.

BackstoryDef.title: logger
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] took down trees and collected wood in hilly passes and ravines. [PAWN_pronoun] learned both how to fell the trees safely, and how to manage the forest to keep it healthy.

BackstoryDef.title: ranger
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tracked animals and people for a wide range of clients. [PAWN_pronoun] became adept at reading spoor, finding food in the wild, and stalking prey.

BackstoryDef.title: forester
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew and harvested forests. [PAWN_pronoun] understood both the practical challenges of soil types, wind, and rain, as well as the long-term planning of forest growth.

BackstoryDef.title: furniture builder
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up near forests. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time building beautiful furniture for wealthy glitterworld clients.

BackstoryDef.title: hunter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] hunted wild animals to help feed [PAWN_possessive] community. When times became tough, others looked to [PAWN_objective] as the one to help people through a tough season.

BackstoryDef.title: slaughterer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] slaughtered animals for a living. Others looked down on this work as filthy, but the skills required to manage and cleanly slaughter large numbers of animals were never simple.

BackstoryDef.title: animal farmer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] raised a variety of animals to provide meat, milk, eggs, and leather.

BackstoryDef.title: crop farmer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a crop farm. [PAWN_pronoun] analyzed soil, agricultural equipment, weather patterns, and price trends to optimize the planting and harvesting of massive crop fields.

BackstoryDef.title: corporate manager
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a massive open-plan office, ensuring that [PAWN_possessive] assigned team of workers stayed mostly on-task. \nThe job was intensely political. In order to advance, [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to arrange things so [PAWN_pronoun] could take credit for work done by almost anyone.

BackstoryDef.title: livestock farmer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a livestock farm. [PAWN_pronoun] analyzed animal genetics, feed types, birth and slaughter methods, and price trends to optimize the raising of huge animal herds.
